review: I had my root canal at Dr. Shraddha ( sandhya dental clinic) and i am happier with the treatment.. The entire staff was incredibly friendly and helpful Dr shraddha was gentle and informative throughout the entire procedure.. The procedure was quick and painless.. I highly recommend Dr. Shraddha ( Sandhya dental clinic) in thakur village..

Dr.Shraddha madam is * ********* ******** *** most recommended Dentist who can operate any type of Dental surgery effortlessly.She deals very sensitively and carefully with patients which makes them feel no pain.New patients should not worry about their dental problems as Dr.Shraddha mam is there for you.

Smiling brighter thanks to Sandhya Dental Clinic! Painless procedures, friendly staff, A+ experience.
Thank You!
Doctor Deshmukh is a wonderful passionate, loving caring doctor.I highly recommend this doctor.  All staff is very friendly.
reply_text: Thanku so much mam..for your kind words..

review: I went there for a 2nd opinion for my mom's tooth ache as a week before I took her to some other dentist and she suggested for tooth extraction which we doubted. Dr. Deshmukh could correctly identify that my mom has got pain n 2 teeth and those needs rct and not extraction. Since we are coming from Malad she completed most of her job and needs 3 more sittings.

*** ******** ** ** ********* *******. She explains all the upside and downside of the treatment.. She is very careful *** **** *******.. She successfully done the root canals of my 4 teeth i m so happy with the  treatment.. Thanku so much dr.
Great experience,very modern clinic,very nice nd friendly staff,most affordable clinic in thakur Village,doctor was very gentle , procedure was unpainful Thanks to doctor
